Title: A Flash of Light
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Patrick Harbinson
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Elizabeth Marvel, F. Murray Abraham
Plot: Carrie handles her client. Saul's trip takes a turn. Quinn investigates.
